channel.title: Help please. rep +
channel.description:
okay, so i want to put a 30 second timer on my donator option, so people don't abuse it, its a option to Refill your spec. instently when you're not in battle, i want it to have a timer off 30 before you can regain spec from it, hears a picture, if this doesn't Sound right. =p
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/98wqcy.png[/img]

item.title: Help please. rep +
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

[quote=“eballer48, post:10, topic:416668”][quote author=pot up pls link=topic=518558.msg3768596#msg3768596 date=1317483870]
instently when you’re not in battle, i want it to have a timer off 30 before you can regain spec from it, [size=18pt]hears[/size] a picture, if this doesn’t Sound right. =p
[/quote]

Grammar Nazi.

On Topic:
Why are you guys spoon feeding him?[/quote]

And it’s his choice on what he wants to do?..
If you think its wrong, this section isnt where you belong.
With all do respect.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please. rep +
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

In ClickingButtons.java make a case and include case 107230: if (c.isDonator == 0 || c.playerRights == 0 || c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("You must be out of wilderness and be a donator to use this!"); return; } if (c.specAmount < 5.0) { if (c.specRest > 0) return; c.specRest = 240; c.sendMessage("You May Only Restore Your Special Every 3 Minutes!"); c.specAmount = 5.0; c.getItems().addSpecialBar(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]); c.sendMessage("Your special attack has been restored."); } break;

Read full topic
